Author: Evlve
Title: ANN [DOV] DOVU - Blockchain for Mobility backed by InMotion
Body: This is the most common criticism I see of this project. People really need to do their research a little better. Especially before calling projects a scam; it essentially amounts to I DIDNT LOOK INTO THIS AT ALL BUT LOOK AT THIS SUPERFICIALLY SCARY THING.  I'll be generous though.  .3B tokens were available in the token sale they actually ended up burning .236  (not exact amounts) hence the 63 mil in circulating supply i.e. Tradeable  .42B tokens are allocated to a user growth fund. These are earned by contributing to the quality of the ecosystem. These can only be used within the DOVU ecosystem for value added services. Unused user growth fund tokens get returned after 6 months to be used for new users. In other words these won't be traded on exchanges they'll be used in the ecosystem that DOVU creates  .18B for team building. These are vested in six month installments. These could be exchanged and added to the circulating supply.  .3B are reserved/locked down for two years  1.5 mil for the bounty  So the team has 3x the circulating supply but divided up into 4 installments so that should be a pretty gradual introduction into circulation. Not to mention with everything the team is accomplishing it's highly unlikely they devalue their own token by dumping  And a little under 5x after two years. Based on their very aggressive road map DOVU is going to be rocking by then. Will it cause some inflation and FUD? Yes but I don't think that will impact anything in the next 18 months, and even then this is one of the most professional teams I've ever seen. They aren't hyping and pumping, they are delivering solid content about their project, nailing milestones (BMW pilots and probably many more in the coming months), and for them to build all that then destroy their token but market selling .3B is highly unlikely. They'll get what they've earned and enjoy the rest as they continue to grow. That's just my opinion after looking into this for a few months I could be wrong, but that's my wager  Source https://dovu.io/whitepaper.pdf  Roadmap is in there too.  The team really hasn't gotten the credit they deserve for what they're doing at the moment. Luckily that means very cheap tokens for anyone that agrees.

Body: Hi,  Thank you for this post, I understand where you come from. What people need to understand is that DOVU is a utility token. Besides having a value on the market it has a value within our ecosystem. We will continue to release more supply as it’s needed for future projects. User growth fund tokens will be released for user growth fund purposes, team tokens for incentives, etcetera. The ultimate goal is to increase token utility. The reserve (300 million) is locked in for 2 years. Because tokens enter circulating supply for projects etc., this doesn’t mean that they are going to be immediately traded on exchanges. Title: ANN [DOV] DOVU - Blockchain for Mobility backed by InMotion
Body: Post-ICO Interview with DOVU CMO Arwen Smit  https://www.chipin.com/post-ico-interview-dovu-cmo-arwen-smit/   transforming the mobility space is not a one-person mission. DOVU has close relationships in the transportation ecosystem, adding to its sector expertise. Partnerships are key to gaining market share. InMotion Ventures, the wholly owned subsidiary of Jaguar Land Rover, is an investor and partner to DOVU, amplifying its connections in the mobility space. Announcements on partnerships with other OEMs will follow soon. Also, DOVU is working with KPMG to make sure it’s structured correctly, ready to scale globally.  Secondly, there is a worrying trend in the industry. There are over 1000 ERC-20 tokens, leading to siloed communities – one of the very things blockchain intends to solve. DOVU wants to shift the focus from isolated ecosystems to the underlying blockchain technology, by being interoperable with other blockchain protocols (e.g. IOTA and Ethereum). Combined with intuitive UX, demystifying the benefits of blockchain technology, this positions the DOV token to be the global unit of value for the mobility and transportation ecosystem.  Lastly, the core team consists of entrepreneurs, blockchain developers, product marketers, product designers and legal experts – all with significant experience shipping and supporting products used by millions of people. The team knows how to build a global business, having worked with the likes of Google, Mercedes, Microsoft, Jaguar, Ethereum, Facebook, CERN, BP, and Rolls Royce.............

There are so many data sets arising from transport and I believe DOVU will make them available on a blockchain-based network so companies and individuals can do research and cross different sets for data insight. Body: In this context circular economy refers to a couple of components: 1) Levelling the playing field: Giving individuals as much opportunity to reap the benefits of the mobility data they own as corporations (in form of the DOV token). 2) Accelerating the actualisation of the benefits: By making data (APIs) easier to understand and combine, it will become easier to reap the benefits of mobility data.
